reviewText: Can be very informative. Some points should've been more in depth, but overall it is an informative and entertaining documentary if you are interested in the history of the subject.
Very informative good way to show a point

I hate to be so negative, but this is perhaps the worst documentary/series I've ever seen.  An important, interesting topic is taken and made into a boring, repetitive, slow-moving six episodes.  It's truly disappointing, because I was hoping to be able to show some of these to my sociology classes.

The price is great, but you get what you pay for.  Find something else to watch.  Trust me.
